id: Partial approval of details pursuant to condition 4c (Verification Report) of planning permission 19/04712/FUL (Demolition of existing buildings (Use Class B1/2) and redevelopment of the site to provide two new dwellings (1x 4 bed and 1x3 bed) (Use Class C3) granted on appeal ref: APP/N5660/W/20/3259026 on 10 August 2021.
Erection of a single storey side and rear extension to the existing dormer.

Single storey ground floor rear extension with a covered alleyway and the installation of a flat roof sky light. Replacement of timber framed sash windows with like for like timber framed sash windows. Ground floor redesign and all associated works.

Erection of a single storey upwards extension to create a second floor.
Replacement of existing aluminum windows and doors with double glazed aluminum units which match the existing style, colour and profile of the existing units.
Erection of a single storey side-return extension and single storey rear extension.
Rear garden: T1 Yew. Fell to ground level. Reason: Tree dead.
Erection of rear mansard roof extension and installation of 3 roof lights to the front roof slope - Flat A.

Alterations to the rear elevation including the replacement of rear extension windows with aluminium bi-fold doors, the replacement of the existing rear extension roof with a lantern roof, like-for-like replacement of all existing windows, and the replacement of the existing garden wall with a timber boundary fence
Rear garden: T1 London Plane: Prune back to the previously approved pruning points consistent with works permitted under Ref. 23/03670/TCA.

Erection of a hip-to-gable roof extension, a rear dormer roof extension with photovoltaic panels and a rear extension at first floor level with new flat roof; installation of 3 rooflights to the front roof slope; raising of an existing chimney stack, and other associated works.
Front garden: T1 Willow. Fell to ground level. T2 Spruce. Fell to ground level. Reason: Tree roots causing damage to property as identified in property survey.
Display of 1 x internally illuminated fascia sign above ground floor shopfront.

id: Erection of two rear dormer windows, with the installation of two front roof lights, plus two roof lights to the rear outrigger and solar panels.

External works, involving resurfacing of the car park with the replacement/new concrete paving, the provision of car parking spaces and refuse store, the renewal of timber sash windows, masonry repairs to the stone cornice to the front elevation and roofing works including replacement of the covering and flat roof sections, and the installation of a new entrance doors to the side elevation. Internal works to the ground floor involving fire door renewals, , MEP and M&E works across the buildings, remodelling including en-suite facilities , the relocation of reception area and office to conference room and new partition wall to create of a communal area, conversion of bathing facilities into communal kitchen, the removal of the computer suite to create two stores, alteration to the main office to create the main entrance lobby space, along with other associated works. (Please note: The reference number for this Listed Building Consent application is 25/03397/LB but there is also an associated application for Full Planning Permission related to these works with reference number: 25/03396/FUL).

External works, involving resurfacing of the car park with the replacement/new concrete paving, the provision of car parking spaces and refuse store, the renewal of timber sash windows, masonry repairs to the stone cornice to the front elevation and roofing works including replacement of the covering and flat roof sections, and the installation of a new entrance doors to the side elevation. Internal works to the ground floor involving fire door renewals, , MEP and M&E works across the buildings, remodelling including en-suite facilities , the relocation of reception area and office to conference room and new partition wall to create of a communal area, conversion of bathing facilities into communal kitchen, the removal of the computer suite to create two stores, alteration to the main office to create the main entrance lobby space, along with other associated works. (Full Planning nad Listed Building Consent ref : 25/03397/LB applications received).
Demolition of existing roof ridge to create an extension to the first floor, including the installation of 6 roof lights and the replacemement of a door.

id: Rear garden: T1 Ash. Section fell to ground level. Reason: Self seeded tree growing through boundary fence and blocking light to garden.
Rear garden: T1 Ash. Section fell to ground level. Reason: Self seeded tree growing through boundary fence and blocking light to garden.
Rear garden: T1 Elder. Fell to ground level. Reason: Leaning onto outbuilding. T2 Elder. Crown reduce by up to 1.5 m all round. Reason: Crown resting on building structure.

Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development (Proposed) with respect to the removal of the front boundary wall and gate, and the introduction of porous material hard standing to the front garden.

Application for a non-material amendment following a grant of planning permission ref. 25/01022/LDCP (Application for Certificate of Lawfulness (Proposed) with respect to the erection of a rear dormer roof extension together with the installation of 3 rooflights to the front roof slope) granted on 22.05.2025. Amendment sought: Replacement of the side dormer cheeks from timber and tile to brick

Application for Certificate of Lawfulness (Proposed) with respect to the erection of a single storey rear extension, replacement of flat roof to existing garage with a pitched roof and replacement of exiting front garage door with a window.

Erection of a two storey rear extensions and the relocation of existing rear stairs for 82 Doverfield. Erection of a single storey ground floor side extension to 76 Doverfield. Erection of a hip to gable roof extension to 76 Doverfield with the insertion of window to side elevations apex; together with the erection of 2x rear dormers with juliet balconies, and installation of 4x rooflights to the front roofslopes across 76 to 82 Doverfield.

PLEASE SEE ATTACHED SURVEY PROVIDED BY TMA AND UPDATED BY TREE PROJECTS 26/11/2025. -WE NOTE THAT THE RECOMMENDATIONS WITH REGARDS TO FELLING AND RE-POLLARDING ADVISED BY TMA 25/04/2025 HAVE NOT BEEN IMPLEMENTED OTHER THAN ASH TREE T7 HAS BEEN REMOVED. -IN ADDITION, RE-POLLARDING OF SPECIFIC ASH TREES ADVOCATED BY TMA APPEARS NOT TO HAVE BEEN FULLY IMPLEMENTED AND, WHERE PREVIOUSLY NO POLLARDING WAS RECOMMENDED, THIS IS NOW CONSIDERED OVERDUE, ON BASIS THAT TREES SHOULD REASONABLY BE MAINTAINED ON A THREE YEAR CYCLE, ASH TREES TO REMAIN ARE ALL TO BE RE-POLLARDED. -ADDITIONAL NON-SIGNIFICANT MINOR AND GENERAL MAINTENANCE PRUNING THAT HAS BECOME REQUIRED IS ADDED. -T4 IS TO BE FELLED AT CLEINT REQUEST: THIS IS A NON-SIGNIFICANT UNSUSAINABLY LOCATED SMALL TREE. -ONE SMALL LIME TREE TO BE TRANSPLANTED TO POSITION OF T16, -NEW PLANTING NEEDED TO REPLACE PROPOSED REMOVALS: EXISTING REPLACEMENT PLANTING, ACER P. BRILLIANTISSIIMUM, CONSIDERED TO BE AND SELF-EVIDENTLY INADEQUATE FOR THE LOCATION AND SHOULD BE REPLACED: A SPECIFICATION IS PROVIDED RECOMMENDING PLANTING OF 12-14CM STEM GIRTH PRUNUS AVIUM PLENA INTO MULCHED BEDS.
addr: St Thomas Church Telford Avenue London SW2 4XW

Erection of a single storey ground floor rear extension following demolition of the existing single storey conservatory, and all associated works.

Erection of a single storey ground floor rear/side infill extension, the enlargement and replacement of a rear door unit for French doors, the installation of a rear fanlight with double glazed, new garden with terrace and landscaping works.

Erection of garden shed for use as a sensory room to the rear.

id: Crown clearance from current height of 20m and spread of 15m to 3m and 5m due to overhanging onto the highway and street lamp.

(T1) Plum - 2.5m height, no crown spread - section fell to ground level Reasons for removal: multiple ganoderma brackets at base of the tree and extremely close to the property. Estimated under 2m from the rear wall. (T2) Holm Oak - crown reduction to ensure the tree does not outgrow space. Tree to be retained as topiary in future. Reduce height by 2m and sides by 1.5m into umbrella shape Height from 5.0m to 3.0m Crown spread from 3.0m to 1.5-2.0m To Flat 2.

Erection of a roof extension with roof lights to create a second floor, together with the replacement of the first floor balcony and windows/door with infill windows and the installation of opaque side windows.
Demolition of existing ground floor rear extension with the erection of a ground floor side infill extension.

Retrospective application for the conversion of a single dwelling into two self contained flats, together with replacement of the rear dormer with a roof extension, and repairs/replacement of slates to rear roof.

Variation of Condition 5 (Delivery restrictions) of planning permission 97/00823/FUL (Demolition of existing building to facilitate the erection of a double height building with pitched roof to provide 1049 sq.metres of retail floor space (Class A1) with the provision of 26 car parking bays and a service yard at rear.) Granted on 17.10.1997. Amendment Sought: To allow Lidl to have a single delivery at the store on Sundays and Bank / Public Holidays between 10am and 4pm, using the rear delivery area.
